Rulings.Base: 1. "This card cannot be used as a Fusion Material Monster" is not an effect and cannot be negated.\n2. The effect to add 1 'Gladiator Beast' monster starts a Chain and does not target.\n3. Discarding 1 'Gladiator Beast' card is a cost.
